languages.text: {n}Пиратка в ужасе выставляет руки вперед.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, умоляю, пощадите! У меня не было выбора, я... я должна была защитить себя! Постойте, вот..." {n}Ризза достает и протягивает вам небольшую инфопластину.{/n} "Это координаты моего схрона. Все что в нем — ваше. Только позвольте мне уйти, и вы никогда меня больше не увидите!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Пиратка в ужасе выставляет руки вперед.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, умоляю, пощадите! У меня не было выбора, я... я должна была защитить себя! Постойте, вот..." {n}Ризза достает и протягивает вам небольшую инфопластину.{/n} "Это координаты моего схрона. Все что в нем — ваше. Только позвольте мне уйти, и вы никогда меня больше не увидите!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

languages.text: {n}莱萨惊恐地伸出双手。{/n}“饶我一命吧，大人！我求求你了！我走投無路了，我……我只能拼死一搏！等等，这个……”{n}莱萨拿出了一个小小的数据板，地给了你。{/n}“这是我秘密藏宝处的坐标，里面的东西你都可以拿走。只要你饶我一命，我就再也不会出现在你面前！”
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨惊恐地伸出双手。{/n}“饶我一命吧，大人！我求求你了！我走投五路了，我……我只能拼死一搏！等等，这个……”{n}莱萨拿出了一个小小的数据板，地给了你。{/n}“这是我秘密藏宝处的坐标，里面的东西你都可以拿走。只要你饶我一命，我就再也不会出现在你面前！”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}海賊は両手を前に出し、怯えた顔をした。{/n}「助けてください、陛下！お願いします！私は他に方法がなかった、わ、私は、自分を守るしかなかったんです！待った、えっと…」{n}リザは小さなデータスレートを取り出すと手渡してくる。{/n}「ここに、隠し場所の座標が入っています。ここにあるものは全部持っていけばいい。だから、今私を解放しておくれ。そうしたら、もう二度とあなたの目の前に現れないからさ」
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海賊は両手を前に出し、怯えた顔をした。{/n}「助けてください、陛下！お願いします！私は他に方法がなかった、わ、私は、自分を守るしかなかったんです！待った、えっと…」{n}リザは小さなデータスレートを取り出すと手渡してくる。{/n}「ここに、隠し場所の座標が入っています。ここにあるものは全部持っていけばいい。だから、今私を解放しておくれ。そうしたら、もう二度とあなたの目の前に現れないからさ」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}La pirata extiende las manos horrorizada.{/n} «¡Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, se lo ruego! No tenía elección, ¡tenía que protegerme! Espere, déjeme..». {n}Ryzza saca una pequeña tablilla de datos y te la entrega.{/n} «Contiene las coordenadas de mi escondite secreto. Puede llevarse todo lo que hay. Déjeme ir y no volverá a verme».
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La pirata extiende las manos horrorizada.{/n} «¡Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, se lo ruego! No tenía elección, ¡tenía que protegerme! Espere, déjeme..». {n}Ryzza saca una pequeña tablilla de datos y te la entrega.{/n} «Contiene las coordenadas de mi escondite secreto. Puede llevarse todo lo que hay. Déjeme ir y no volverá a verme».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Die Piratin streckt verängstigt die Hände aus.{/n} "Verschont mich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, ich flehe Euch an! Ich hatte keine Wahl, ich ... ich musste mich schützen! Augenblick, lasst mich ..." {n}Ryzza holt einen kleinen Datablock heraus und gibt ihn dir.{/n} "Darauf sind die Koordinaten meines Geheimlagers. Ihr dürft alles darin haben. Lasst mich nur einfach gehen, Ihr werdet mich nie wiedersehen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Piratin streckt verängstigt die Hände aus.{/n} "Verschont mich, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, ich flehe Euch an! Ich hatte keine Wahl, ich ... ich musste mich schützen! Augenblick, lasst mich ..." {n}Ryzza holt einen kleinen Datablock heraus und gibt ihn dir.{/n} "Darauf sind die Koordinaten meines Geheimlagers. Ihr dürft alles darin haben. Lasst mich nur einfach gehen, Ihr werdet mich nie wiedersehen!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}La pirate tend les mains devant elle, terrifiée.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous en supplie, épargnez-moi ! Je n'avais pas le choix, je... Il fallait que je me protège ! Attendez, permettez-moi de... » {n}Ryzza sort une petite plaque de données et vous la tend.{/n} « Cette plaque contient les coordonnées de ma cachette secrète, vous pouvez prendre tout ce qui s'y trouve. Laissez-moi partir et vous ne me reverrez jamais ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La pirate tend les mains devant elle, terrifiée.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous en supplie, épargnez-moi ! Je n'avais pas le choix, je... Il fallait que je me protège ! Attendez, permettez-moi de... » {n}Ryzza sort une petite plaque de données et vous la tend.{/n} « Cette plaque contient les coordonnées de ma cachette secrète, vous pouvez prendre tout ce qui s'y trouve. Laissez-moi partir et vous ne me reverrez jamais ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Korsan, dehşete düşmüş bir şekilde ellerini uzatıyor.{/n} "Affet beni {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yalvarıyorum! Başka seçeneğim yoktu! Kendimi... Kendimi korumak zorundaydım! Dur, bak..." {n}Ryzza, küçük bir databela çıkarıp sana veriyor.{/n} "Bunun içinde gizli zulamın koordinatlarını bulabilirsin. İçindeki her şey senin olsun. Bırak beni gideyim, bir daha asla karşına çıkmam!"
languages.original_text: {n}The pirate holds out her hands, terrified.{/n} "Spare me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I beg you! I had no choice, I— I had to protect myself! Wait, let me..." {n}Ryzza takes out a small data-slate and hands it to you.{/n} "This contains the coordinates of my secret stash. You're welcome to everything in it. Just let me go and you'll never see me again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Korsan dehşete düşmüş bir şekilde ellerini uzatıyor.{/n} "Affet beni {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yalvarıyorum! Başka seçeneğim yoktu! Kendimi... Kendimi korumak zorundaydım! Dur, bak..." {n}Ryzza küçük bir databela çıkarıyor ve sana veriyor.{/n} "Bunun içinde gizli zulamın koordinatlarını bulabilirsin. İçindeki her şey senin olsun. Yalnızca beni bırak gideyim, bir daha beni asla görmeyeceksin!"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
